title: Domestic markets more exciting, but exports recovery has commenced too: Rakesh Sharma, Bajaj Auto
description: "Retail financing is progressing very well. We are seeing tenures of loans going up, which is a very good indication because is suggests that people have confidence in a continued stream of income based on which they are taking longer-tenure loans."
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
